name: Theme
info: You can obtain the ThemeData object through Theme.of. You can also specify a theme to be applied to the descendant components of Theme.

nodes.name: Text Style-ThemeData#TextTheme
desc: Child components can use the theme data obtained through ThemeData.of.

nodes.name: Usage of Theme
desc: Using Theme, you can specify a wide range of properties as themes, which will be applied to all descendant components, such as specifying properties for fonts, sliders, cards, text, dividers, buttons, etc.
